issue.title: building from source error in under Ubuntu 12.04

content.raw:
I played with it a little more, it looks like the modversion and exists calls to pkgconfig all work when a Requires: is missing, but calls to cflags and libs don't.  I think that's why CMake says that Player was detected (it only checks for existance/version), but the CFLAGS aren't getting set (-I/usr/include/player-3.0 is needed to resolve libplayercore/playercore.h, and it comes from pkgconfig when the Requires are all present)

Edit: There is a bug against CMake for this behavior already:
http://public.kitware.com/Bug/view.php?id=14310
